rekey_time.description: Rekey Interval in seconds, Default=4 hours, Disabled=0

reauth_time.description: IKE Reauthentication Interval in seconds, Default=0, Disabled=0

initiator.description: Indicates if this is the initiator

otp_enforce.description: OTP Enforcement setting for all users. When set all users must provide OTP for login.

token_timeout_sec.description: Auth Token Timeout in seconds (default: 30 minutes)

enable_remote_syslog.description: True if remote syslog server is enabled
